mapper.update: update ecs_virtual_card set goods_id = #{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_sn = #{card_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_password = #{card_password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_date = #{add_date,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_date = #{end_date,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_saled = #{is_saled,jdbcType=BIT}, order_sn = #{order_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crc32 = #{crc32,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where card_id = #{card_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select card_id, goods_id, card_sn, card_password, add_date, end_date, is_saled, order_sn, crc32 from ecs_virtual_card where card_id = #{card_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select card_id, goods_id, card_sn, card_password, add_date, end_date, is_saled, order_sn, crc32 from ecs_virtual_card
